column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Came with a few friends and had an amazing night at Bosscat on Friday. Terry is the best server we've encountered on our night's out
column2: he was very knowledgeable about the menu both in food and beverages. The food was delicious and i didnt drink but my friends said the drinks were strong and good. The owner John even came by and introduced himself. There was great music Friday night and I felt very safe because there was two police officers in the place. Overall we had an amazing time. Great food
